founder.name: Nikhil Mahadeshwar
founder.bio: Founder of Cyber Secured India, driving the mission to create a safer digital environment through comprehensive cybersecurity awareness, education, and innovative solutions.

coreTeam.name: Prathamesh Rane
coreTeam.bio: Leading Cyber Secured India's strategic vision and operations, dedicated to building a robust cybersecurity ecosystem across the nation.

coreTeam.name: Retd. ACP Ravi Sardesai
coreTeam.bio: Former Assistant Commissioner of Police bringing extensive law enforcement experience to strengthen cybersecurity governance and government relations.

coreTeam.name: Mahendra Chavan
coreTeam.bio: Managing day-to-day operations and ensuring seamless execution of cybersecurity programs and community initiatives.

coreTeam.name: Nidhi Shah
coreTeam.bio: Leading legal and compliance efforts to ensure adherence to cybersecurity regulations and data protection standards.

coreTeam.name: Mahadev Gavas
coreTeam.bio: Core team member contributing to cybersecurity awareness campaigns and community engagement programs.

coreTeam.name: Kirankumar Subuddi
coreTeam.bio: Core team member actively involved in technical security initiatives and educational outreach programs.

coreTeam.name: Shinja Nagvekar
coreTeam.bio: Core team member dedicated to advancing cybersecurity education and community building initiatives.

coreTeam.name: Prasad Palwankar
coreTeam.bio: Core team member supporting cybersecurity research and development of innovative security solutions.

coreTeam.name: Akash Patil
coreTeam.bio: Core team member focused on technical cybersecurity operations and threat intelligence activities.

advisors.name: Dr. Radhakrishnan Pillai
advisors.bio: Renowned mentor and thought leader guiding cybersecurity initiatives with extensive academic and industry experience.

advisors.bio: Retired Colonel offering tactical and strategic guidance in cybersecurity operations and defense protocols.

advisors.name: Alpana Barua
advisors.bio: Strategic advisor with deep expertise in cybersecurity policy, digital transformation, and organizational security frameworks.

advisors.name: Retd. Brig. Ramesh Balan
